items.content_html: Things 3 from Cultured Code looks fantastic. The limitations of it worry me a bit, but I’m hoping I can integrate it into my workflow.

Hulu Live TV appears to be much better than YouTube TV. However, they are continuing the trend of TV apps that emphasize content over channel surfing. Those used to old TV paradigms may therefore find the app hard to navigate. That’s my first impression – more thoughts soon.

On iOS 10.3.1, changing an app’s icon only triggers a pop-up on some of my apps. Is anyone else seeing this?

For me, these apps never show a pop-up:

  • Narwhal
  • Hello Weather

And these always show it:

  • MLB At Bat
  • Overcast

If you enjoy Tetris, you won’t be disappointed by Puyo Puyo Tetris for Switch. Note that local multiplayer isn’t great – the controls were clearly built for d-pad, and playing with a control stick (Pro Controller or single Joy-Con) leads to lots of frustrating accidental input.
I’m really enjoying Mario Kart 8 Deluxe for Nintendo Switch! It’s great to have a portable Mario Kart game with no compromises. Online matchmaking needs some work but it’s very solid otherwise.
